description.narrative: The Project Development Objective is to strengthen selected systems that contribute to quality, accountability, and efficiency improvements in education in the Republic of Kosovo.

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :Annual Work Plan and Budget | Description :The Recipient shall through the MEST prepare and furnish to theAssociation not later than November 15 of each Fiscal year during the implementation of the Project, an Annual Work Plan and Budgetcontaining all activities proposed to be included in the Project during the following Fiscal Year and a proposed financing plan forexpenditures required for such activities. | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Project Coordination Unit (PCU) | Description :The Recipient shall establish, and thereafter maintain a ProjectCoordination Unit (PCU) within MEST, satisfactory to the Association. | Frequency :CONTINUOUS

Finance Agreement :Project Implementation Committee (PIC) | Description :Within 40 days from the Effective Date, the Recipientshall establish, and thereafter maintain, a Project Implementation Committee (PIC), with composition comprising among othersdirectors of the relevant departments in the MEST, and with terms of reference and resources satisfactory to the Association. |Frequency :CONTINUOUS

Finance Agreement :Project Steeriing Committee (PSC) | Description :Within 60 days from the Effective Date, the Recipient shallestablish, and thereafter maintain, a Project Steering Committee (PSC) responsible for providing policy guidance for, and oversightof, the Project. | Frequency :CONTINUOUS

Finance Agreement :School Development Grants (SDGs) | Description :The Recipient shall make School development Grants (SDGs) toselected schools on the terms and conditions set out in the School grants Manual and sign the School Development SubprojectAgreements with the Municipalities concerned and the selected School. | Frequency :CONTINUOUS
